snippet: Crisis looms, because crisis is all Washington can do these days.
abstract: Congressional Memo; it is unlikely that Congress will pass any of the stalled measures under consideration before the July 4 recess, including bills that were once considered necessary and uncontroversial; the legislative impasse is an ominous sign for the much harder work waiting for the lame-duck Congress at the end of 2012.
lead_paragraph: Crisis looms, because crisis is all Washington can do these days.

headline.seo: Congressional Memo: As Recess Nears, Little Hope for Breaking Partisan Impasse
headline.main: As Recess Nears, Little Hope for Breaking Partisan Impasse
headline.print_headline: As Recess Nears, Hopes Dim for Ending Impasse
